author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Correct the DD4hep algorithm for the HGCaal passive elements

#### PR validation:

Use the corrected the routine to dump geometry and cross-checked with the results from a similar dump from the DDD version

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx363G Correct the DD4hep algorithm for the HGCaal passive elements
